tox-environments.description: A list of tox environments to run.

tox-skip-environments-regex.description: A regular expression matching tox environments to skip.

tox-skip-environments.description: A list of tox environments to skip.

tox-environments-from-pythons.description: Generate a list of tox environments from the list of all configured Python interpreters.

tox-factors.description: A list of factors to append to the generated names of tox environments.

tox-pre-environments.description: A list of tox environments to run before all installed Python interpreter versions.

tox-post-environments.description: A list of tox environments to run after all installed Python interpreter versions.

cpythons.description: A list of CPython interpreter versions. Typically, the *last version* listed will be the default Python interpreter when 'python' is invoked, and will be the version used when installing and executing tox.

cpython-beta.description: A CPython version to install as a beta. Unless the 'cpythons' list is empty, this version will never be the default Python interpreter.

pypys.description: A list of PyPy interpreter versions.

cache-key-prefix.description: A prefix to use with the cached environment key.

cache-key-hash-files.description: An additional path pattern that will be added to the list of paths to include when hashing files for cache-busting.

cache-paths.description: Additional paths to cache. Any paths specified here will be added to the default list: '.venv/' and '.tox/'.

allOf.description: At least one Python interpreter must be specified.
If tox-environments is specified, many other keys must not be specified.
tox-environments is mutually exclusive with tox-environments-from-pythons.
tox-environments is mutually exclusive with tox-factors.
tox-environments is mutually exclusive with tox-pre-environments.
tox-environments is mutually exclusive with tox-post-environments.
tox-environments is mutually exclusive with tox-skip-environments.
tox-environments is mutually exclusive with tox-skip-environments-regex.
